page.title: 10Games Children Play
page.content: When I was young there were many games we used to play such as Red Rover,Kerbie,Kick the Can and Hospital tick. All of these games were very entertaining.Here are simple rules for each of the games. Red Rover-there were two teams to start off with,each team had to stand in a line and hold hands.One team then nominated a person from there team to run across and break through the barrier of arms of the opposite team. Whe this person was nominated the other team had to chant"Red Rover,Red Rover we call(name of person) over." Kerbie-this was played by two people and a ball.Each person had to stand on the kerb(one person each side of the street).You then had to throw the ball at the kerb opposite to you.
